I lose my best friend because of bullies. I enjoyed this manga, cause bullies deserve to get punished and they all deserve the most suffering
However I did enjoy the worms bit and the dad raping her as his daughter watched.

Plus they tortured and raped her over the course of multiple days and while it's adequate payback by condensing down the pain of the other girl into a few days, killing the bully and putting her through the same amount of pain isn't going to really solve anything for them and make the lives of others just as bad.

Whenever I finish jacking off to this I always hope that she's secretly not dead and was acting it out, then when they leave she manages to get herself off of that hook and unchains herself and escapes.

I understand when you mention in the story that a girl killed herself because she was bullied by this character, but when you show the suffering and bring the family aspect of it all into the story and how you get a better understanding of the other family's suffering over not being able to find her I feel inclined to root for this character, even considering what she did.

There is an interesting thing about this doujin artist: she is a woman. In fact, most guro artists nowadays ARE women. She made an interview years ago and she said that she was abused by her parents and ex couples. Maybe she uses guro as her coping mechanism, or maybe all the abuse she suffered turned into a weird obsession. 

If someone complains about women getting killed and raped in doujin, think about it: most of them are women, and probably they're like the artist.
